p: Copper added to NiTi (CuNiTi) was commercially available since the 90’s, it provides an increase in the effectiveness of tooth movement and a reduction over the orthodontic treatment’s duration ( 2). CuNiTi 35°C orthodontic wire is used in the DAMON system with self-ligating brackets to reduce the coefficient of attrition observed in conventional technique leading to a reduction of the number of visits and a protection of the passive layer at the surface of the wire ( 3).
